title: Forced queue dodge because client wouldn't lock in champ

replies.body: It seems that your network is losing connection to the server and losing sync during champion select.  As Rineyy suggested, the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide may have some steps to get this fixed up for you.  Hit me up if you are still having issues and we can dig deeper.

Lagging in champ select is usually due to connectivity issues. [Troubleshoot them.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
